item.description: Getting the top-level directory of the relevant git worktree #!/usr/bin/env bash # set up a dummy repo set -euo pipefail experiment_dir="$(mktemp -d --tmpdir test_repo.XXX)" git clone --recurse-submodules git@github.com:SKalt/dummy_repo.git "$experiment_dir" cd "$experiment_dir" git pull --recurse-submodules=yes git checkout -b brnch && git checkout - # set up a dummy branch git worktree add wrktr brnch # add a wortree cd wrktr && git submodule update --init --recursive # init the recursive submodules in the worktree tree .
